detaileddescription.para: ip_stats_rbt_hash_func: computes the hash value for the entry in IP stats cache.

Computes the hash value for the entry in IP stats cache. In fact, it just use addresse as value (identity function) modulo the size of the hash. This function is called internal in the HasTable_* function

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the hash key buffer

detaileddescription.para: ip_stats_rbt_hash_func: computes the rbt value for the entry in IP stats cache.

Computes the rbt value for the entry in IP stats cache. In fact, it just use the address value itself (which is an unsigned integer) as the rbt value. This function is called internal in the HasTable_* function

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the hash key buffer

detaileddescription.para: compare_ip_stats: compares the ip address stored in the key buffers.
compare the ip address stored in the key buffers. This function is to be used as 'compare_key' field in the hashtable storing the nfs duplicated requests.

simplesect.para: 0 if keys are identifical, 1 if they are different.

detaileddescription.para: display_ip_stats: displays the ip_stats stored in the buffer.
displays the ip_stats stored in the buffer. This function is to be used as 'key_to_str' field in the hashtable storing the nfs duplicated requests.
nfs_ip_stats_add: adds an entry in the duplicate requests cache.
Adds an entry in the duplicate requests cache.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the ipaddr to be used as key

simplesect.para: IP_STATS_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR if an error occured during the insertion process
IP_STATS_NETDB_ERROR if an error occured during the netdb query (via gethostbyaddr).

memberdef.argsstring: (hash_table_t *ht_ip_stats, unsigned int ipaddr, unsigned int nfs_prog, unsigned int mnt_prog, struct svc_req *ptr_req)
memberdef.name: nfs_ip_stats_incr

detaileddescription.para: nfs_ip_stats_incr: increments the stats value.
increments the stats value.

simplesect.para: the computed number of call for this ipaddr. Negative value is a failure

detaileddescription.para: nfs_ip_stats_get: gets the stats value.
gets the stats value.

simplesect.para: the computed number of call for this ipaddr. Negative value is a failure

detaileddescription.para: nfs_ip_stats_remove: Tries to remove an entry for ip_stats cache
Tries to remove an entry for ip_stats cache.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the ip address to be uncached.

simplesect.para: the result previously set if *pstatus == IP_STATS_SUCCESS

detaileddescription.para: nfs_Init_ip_stats: Init the hashtable for IP stats cache.
Perform all the required initialization for hashtable IP stats cache

parameterdescription.para: [IN] parameter used to init the duplicate request cache

detaileddescription.para: nfs_ip_stats_dump: Dumps the IP Stats for each client to a file per client

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pattern used to build path used for dumping stats

briefdescription.para: The management of the IP stats per machines.
